SEARCH
Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.weapons

Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.weapons.Weapon
Direct Known Subclasses:
MeleeWeapon, RangedWeapon
public abstract class Weapon extends Object
Represents a generic weapon that the user can add to their loadout.

  • Field Details

    • weaponName

      protected final String weaponName
      The name of the weapon. The user will be able to see the given value.

    • weaponType

      protected final WeaponType weaponType
      The type of weapon. This is used for various Modifier conditions.

    • damageType

      protected final DamageType damageType
      The damage type the weapon afflicts. This is used for various Modifier conditions.

    • weaponDamageByLevel

      protected final HashMap<Integer,Double> weaponDamageByLevel
      A HashMap of the weapons level (Integer) and the base damage it provides (Double).

    • apCost

      protected final int apCost
      The Integer value that it costs to use the weapon.

    • attackSpeed

      protected final double attackSpeed
      The Double value of the speed the weapon fires/attacks at. Different weapons will have varying rate of fires.

    • criticalBonus

      protected final int criticalBonus
      The Integer value of the bonus to critical damage the weapon provides. Primarily used for VATS.

  • Method Details

    • getBaseDamage

      public abstract double getBaseDamage(int weaponLevel)
      Retrieves the Double value of the damage the weapon provides.
      Parameters:
      weaponLevel - The level used to retrieve the provided damage value by corresponding weaponDamageByLevel key.
      Returns:
      The weaponDamageByLevel corresponding damage value.
